It seems that whenever you alter some properties, go into another object/room and try to ADD a property then you get the previous VALUE leeking across...
This picture shows what happens after I altered a property's value of a room, then tried to add a property to an object:
[img:31eyi5ot]http://www.roxor.freeserve.co.uk/QDKBug.gif[/img:31eyi5ot]

This is using QDK 3.5 Beta, build 3.5.108. I have WinXP, not sure about 95/98.
